data.lyric:
[ti:All These N**gas]
[ar:King Von/Lil Durk]
[al:All These N**gas (feat. Lil Durk)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.33]All These N**gas - King Von/Lil Durk
[00:01.84]King Von：
[00:11.04]DJ on the beat so it's a banger
[00:12.82]Yeah
[00:13.02]Lil Durk：
[00:13.35]All these n***as actin' like they with that s**t I ain't stuntin' these n***as
[00:15.97]Let's get it
[00:16.44]Lamb' truck sittin' so low had to crouch my back f**k around
[00:18.31]Had to sit on my pimp
[00:19.43]How you gon' back door n***a you love for a little bit of clout
[00:21.81]That's a shame on n***as
[00:22.70]Shame on n***as
[00:23.18]How you gon' sit in my car
[00:24.07]Tryna play Lil Pump like we ain't two dangerous n***as
[00:25.94]Bro got trial he lost faith he looked up when they changed the verdict
[00:29.10]Let's get it
[00:29.51]Robbers goofy stains pay me for a song don't clear the verse
[00:32.29]Don't clear the verse
[00:32.86]We don't go off names I don't care who they is we go off murders
[00:35.52]We go off murders
[00:36.15]This your first time buying that za za I need 4K for the sherbet
[00:38.78]King Von：
[00:39.13]He a p***y I know n***as in his hood that boy a ho
[00:42.08]That boy a ho
[00:42.62]That p***y dookie I be f**kin' his main b***h and he don't know
[00:45.47]And he don't know
[00:46.18]We got .45 drums everytime they see me I'm on go
[00:48.79]Bow-bow
[00:49.15]Tooka in my lung I say that everytime 'cause he got smoked
[00:51.90]He got smoked
[00:52.33]F**k how you feel for real my best friend he got killed
[00:55.32]We was in that field for real blowin' n***as down boy come here
[00:58.60]Everything I say I mean it 6ix9ine he say he seen't it
[01:01.86]They know King Von a demon super cold that boy anemic
[01:04.87]Lil Durk：
[01:05.44]N***a don't say it in my face
[01:06.46]They say it when I turn my back
[01:07.64]Lil' n***a let's do it
[01:08.68]Let's do it
[01:08.96]Ain't gotta back door ain't gotta snake you out
[01:10.52]Lil' n***a you know we into it
[01:12.09]N***a you ain't good in your hood
[01:13.19]You can't even go to your hood
[01:14.40]Why you tryna blame your hood
[01:15.59]You don't wear chains in the hood
[01:16.87]You don't even claim your hood
[01:18.52]Yeah
[01:18.97]O'Block OTF 300 b***h just check the stats
[01:21.97]N***a said that he be throwin' shots I bet he catch 'em back
[01:25.10]I called folks'em late I know they up I know they in the trap
[01:28.34]Trap
[01:28.67]Got his lo' man his a*s a goofy got his s**t off Snap'
[01:31.43]King Von：
[01:31.77]I been shootin' guns I got bodies from way back
[01:34.77]I spent a lot on bonds once I beat my case I made it back
[01:38.08]You know they like to run but you better not trip boy watch your step
[01:41.34]And I'm just havin' fun and I got that aim shoot like I'm Steph
[01:44.66]Bet yo' b***h wanna meet me she seen me on the TV
[01:47.73]She in love with all these VV's Icebox made my s**t look 3D
[01:51.16]Hell no I ain't hear your CD I'm right here in your city
[01:54.11]Uh huh
[01:54.41]They like "Von you better tuck your chain"
[01:55.81]Don't nobody wanna die ain't nobody that silly
[01:58.18]I been shootin' guns I got bodies from way back
[02:01.07]I spent a lot on bonds once I beat my case I made it back
[02:04.35]You know they like to run but you better not trip boy watch your step
[02:07.60]And I'm just havin' fun and I got that aim shoot like I'm Steph
data.trans:
[ti:All These N**gas]
[ar:King Von/Lil Durk]
[al:All These N**gas (feat. Lil Durk)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.33]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.84]//
[00:11.04]Chopsquad DJ.制作
[00:12.82]//
[00:13.02]//
[00:13.35]所有人都装腔作势 我不会阻止他们
[00:15.97]让我们行动起来
[00:16.44]兰博基尼的座位低矮 我不得不半蹲着坐上去 横行霸道
[00:18.31]身边放着我的手枪
[00:19.43]你怎么为了那一点影响力就走后门
[00:21.81]这真是耻辱
[00:22.70]真丢脸
[00:23.18]你怎么能坐在我的车里
[00:24.07]扮成Lil Pump的样子 好像我们不会让人感到恐惧
[00:25.94]哥们惹上官司 他丧失信心 当他们改变判决时 他抬起头
[00:29.10]让我们行动起来
[00:29.51]劫匪愚蠢至极 拿着脏钱买我的歌 不会清除这些歌词
[00:32.29]不会清除这些歌词
[00:32.86]我们不会畏惧威名 我不在乎他们是谁 我们杀个片甲不留
[00:35.52]我们杀个片甲不留
[00:36.15]这是你第一次买那种东西 我需要高品质的好货
[00:38.78]//
[00:39.13]他是个怂货 我认识他街区的人 这小子卑鄙无耻
[00:42.08]这小子卑鄙无耻
[00:42.62]这个妹子四处留情 我跟他的妹子缠绵 他一无所知
[00:45.47]他一无所知
[00:46.18]我们有0.45口径的枪 每当他们看见我 我扣下扳机
[00:48.79]//
[00:49.15]吞云吐雾 我每次都这样说 因为他横尸街头
[00:51.90]他横尸街头
[00:52.33]根本不在乎你的感受 讲真 我的好友意外丧命
[00:55.32]我们占据一席之地 打败所有人 小子 过来
[00:58.60]我说的每一句话都是认真的 6ix9ine说他没有看见
[01:01.86]他们都知道King Von是恶魔 冷血无情
[01:04.87]//
[01:05.44]这些家伙不敢当面直说
[01:06.46]当我转过背 他们大放厥词
[01:07.64]小兄弟 我们动手吧
[01:08.68]我们动手吧
[01:08.96]我不会从后门偷袭 也不会骗你出去
[01:10.52]小兄弟 你知道我们乐在其中
[01:12.09]哥们 你在你的街区名声不好
[01:13.19]你甚至不会去你的街区
[01:14.40]你为什么要埋怨你的街区
[01:15.59]你不会在街头戴上大金链子
[01:16.87]你甚至不敢宣扬你的街区
[01:18.52]//
[01:18.97]我的老家危机四伏 看看死亡人数就一清二楚
[01:21.97]他说他会开枪 我打赌他会把他们抓回来
[01:25.10]我的电话姗姗来迟 我知道他们兴奋不已 我知道他们在那个地方
[01:28.34]//
[01:28.67]引起他的注意 他愚蠢至极 把他的破事弄得人尽皆知
[01:31.43]//
[01:31.77]我倾泻火力 我很久以前就杀过人
[01:34.77]为了重获自由 我花了不少钱 一旦我解决官司 我就可以把钱挣回来
[01:38.08]你知道他们喜欢奔跑 但是你不要被绊倒 男孩 当心脚下
[01:41.34]我只是找乐子 我百发百中 就像我是Steph
[01:44.66]我打赌你的妹子想见我 她看见我登上电视
[01:47.73]她喜欢这些钻石 尽情放纵 让我神采飞扬
[01:51.16]我没有听你的CD 我就在你的城市里
[01:54.11]//
[01:54.41]他们说 Von 你最好把项链藏起来
[01:55.81]没有人想死 没有人会那么傻吧
[01:58.18]我倾泻火力 我很久以前就杀过人
[02:01.07]为了重获自由 我花了不少钱 一旦我解决官司 我就可以把钱挣回来
[02:04.35]你知道他们喜欢奔跑 但是你不要被绊倒 男孩 当心脚下
[02:07.60]我只是找乐子 我百发百中 就像我是Steph
